noteParagraph.text: Methods or devices for filling bunkers, hoppers, or containers are only classified here if they are of general application apart from their use in particular processes or their application in particular machines or if they are not covered by a single other sub-class.
The term "stacking" means disposing articles individually or in layers one above each other.
